title: 3 bed/1 bath in beautiful grey stone on the boulevard!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   3bed/1bath apartment available 5/1 in gorgeous greystone in West Town/Humboldt Park. The apartment is located directly across the street from the park and a short walk/bike ride to the 606. Close to public transportation, climbing gym at the end of the street, and minutes from Mariano's. Easy street parking.   About the unit: Hardwood floors throughout, tile bathroom and new kitchen appliances. There is a smart eco-friendly thermostat, shared coin washer/dryer in the basement and nice big windows that brings in a lot of natural light. Has a gated front yard and awesome back patio with a table and chairs. The unit is roughly between 1100-1200 sq ft.   Contact me for more info.
